1580540.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Consumable Starter Set
1580540.description:
A set of healing and support items.

Advanced Medicine Set 1
Dragon Incense Set 1
Droplet Set 1
Droplet Set 2
Monster Ingredients Set 1
Sepith Set 1
Septih Set 2
Shining Pom Droplet Set 1
Shining Pom Droplet Set 2
Shining Pom Droplet Value Set 1
Shining Pom Droplet Value Set 2
Spirit Incense Set 1
U-Material Set 1
U-Material Set 2
U-Material Set 3
Useful Accessories Set
Zeram Powder Set 1
Zeram Capsule Set 1

*These items can also be obtained in-game.
*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page.
*If maximum capacity is exceeded, the excess is discarded.
1580540.supported_languages:
英语*, 日语*
